Header.title: Atlas
Header.paragraph: Pin your history, share your story.

About.paragraph: The Atlas app enables older adults to share their rich histories and experiences with younger generations. By attaching stories to specific locations, users can explore personal narratives, fostering a deeper understanding of places and the lives of those who have shaped them.

Services.name: Geolocation Story Mapping
Services.text: Allows users to attach stories to specific locations, creating a dynamic map of memories accessible to all.

Services.name: Oral History Recording
Services.text: Enables older adults to record and share their stories, capturing personal histories that might otherwise be lost.

Services.name: Community Story Sharing
Services.text: Fosters connections between users by enabling shared story guides based on locations or themes.

Services.name: Privacy and Anonymity Options
Services.text: Allows contributors to share stories anonymously, ensuring comfort and security while preserving history.

Testimonials.text: "Atlas helps me share my experiences with my grandchildren and their friends. They can hear my stories whenever they visit our old neighborhood."
Testimonials.name: Alice R.

Testimonials.text: "Exploring Atlas stories has changed the way I view my city. There’s so much I didn’t know about the places I pass every day!"
Testimonials.name: David L.

Features.title: Location-Based Exploration
Features.text: Discover stories attached to various locations by virtually navigating the app or visiting them in person.

Features.title: Audio Storytelling
Features.text: Listen to stories told by the people who lived them, creating a more personal and immersive experience.

Features.title: Curated Story Guides
Features.text: Create or explore story collections centered around specific themes or locations, like a mini-history tour.
